title: How can one find out about the costs for purchasing broadband? - Quora

response.answer_text: Contact your nearest BSNL office or any other Internet Service Provider. Recently I have got fiber net connection (Fiber to the Home) with optimum speed. Fill up the form enclosed and submit along with passport photo + identity card to the nearest BSNL office. Tariff rate begins from Rs.449/- (monthly charges) http://www.ap.bsnl.co.in/forms/FTTH.pdf BSNL FTTH (Bharat Fiber) Broadband Plans
